casebody.data:
Oscar Ray BOLIN, Jr., petitioner,
v.
Julie L. JONES, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections, et al. No. 15-7662 (15A699). Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 7, 2016.

The application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court is denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
